DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate Safety Efficacy Paricalcitol Reducing Serum Intact Parathyroid Hormone Chronic Kidney Disease
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Safety Efficacy Paricalcitol Reducing Serum Intact Parathyroid Hormone Chronic Kidney Disease
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluate safety efficacy paricalcitol injection two different dose regimen ( currently approve dose regimen use US package insert versus dose base formula iPTH/80 approve used EU package insert ) Chronic Kidney Disease ( CKD ) Stage 5 subject secondary hyperparathyroidism receive hemodialysis .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject Chinese male female great equal 20 year old . 2 . Subject diagnose Chronic Kidney Disease Stage 5 must maintenance hemodialysis three time week least 2 month prior Screening Visit expect remain hemodialysis duration study . 3 . For entry Treatment Phase , subject must : Intact parathyroid hormone great equal 300 pg/mL Serum calcium le 10.2 mg/dL ( 2.55 mmol/L ) Calciumphosphorus product le 65 mg^2/dL^2 1 . Subject history allergic reaction significant sensitivity vitamin D vitamin D related compound . 2 . Subject receive partial parathyroidectomy within one year prior Screening Phase . 3 . Subject New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) Class III IV . 4 . Subject take aluminumcontaining phosphate binder great 3 week last 3 month prior Screening Phase , require medication great 3 week study . 5 . Subject current malignancy ( exception basal squamous cell carcinoma skin ) , clinically significant liver disease , opinion Investigator . 6 . Subject history drug alcohol abuse within 6 month prior Screening Phase . 7 . Subject know human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) positive . 8 . Subject evidence poor compliance diet , medication hemodialysis may interfere , Investigator 's opinion , adherence protocol .
